column4: Hey. Is there a way I can browse through the files in a basic Ubuntu installation online? I just want to look at the default sudoers file.
you can download the .debs from packages.ubuntu.com or grab the source rchives with apt.
.deb files are just archives. You can extract them easily.
I'd rather just look at the default sudoers file over HTTP if possible
if you're still looking, I can just e-mail you one.
